title: Successful Google OAuth Login
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully using Google OAuth authentication.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Click on the 'Login with Google' button.
User is redirected to Google OAuth consent screen.
Enter valid Google account credentials and grant permissions.
User is redirected back to the app and authenticated successfully.
The user dashboard is displayed with personalized data.

title: Failed Google OAuth Login with Invalid Account
description: Verify that login fails gracefully when using an invalid or unauthorized Google account during OAuth login.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Click on the 'Login with Google' button.
Enter invalid Google account credentials or cancel consent.
User is shown an appropriate error message without crashing.
User remains on the login page and can attempt to log in again.

title: Successful Facebook OAuth Login
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully using Facebook OAuth authentication.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Click the 'Login with Facebook' button.
User is redirected to Facebook OAuth consent screen.
Enter valid Facebook account credentials and grant permissions.
User is redirected back and authenticated successfully.
Dashboard loads with user-specific content.

title: Failed Facebook OAuth Login with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails gracefully and shows a relevant error message when Facebook login credentials are invalid.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Click 'Login with Facebook' button.
Enter incorrect Facebook credentials or deny permissions.
Display appropriate error message without app crash.
Remain on login page allowing retry.

title: Email Magic Link Authentication Success
description: Verify that a user can request and use the Magic Link email login to authenticate successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Enter a registered email and request Magic Link.
Confirmation message prompts user to check their email.
Open email, click on Magic Link.
User is redirected to app and logged in.
Dashboard loads with personalized data.

title: Email Magic Link Authentication Failure
description: Verify that attempting Magic Link login with an unregistered email shows an error and does not generate a login link.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Enter an unregistered email and submit Magic Link request.
Display an error message indicating the email is not recognized.
No Magic Link email is sent.

title: Onboarding Flow for New User
description: Validate that a new user can complete the onboarding process successfully, including capturing personal birth details, preferences, and uploads.

steps.description: Log in as a new user.
Complete multi-step onboarding: enter birth date/time/location.
Set user preferences for astrology and spiritual interests.
Upload palm, face, and aura images.
Each step validates required input fields and shows errors for invalid or missing data.
On completing the final step, user is redirected to the dashboard.

title: 3D Kundali Chart Rendering and Interaction
description: Verify the Kundali 3D chart is rendered correctly with interactivity and smooth animation at 60fps on desktop and adaptive fallback on mobile.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to the Kundali page.
Kundali 3D chart loads with accurate birth chart data.
Interact with the 3D chart by rotating, zooming, and selecting elements.
Interactions respond smoothly without animation jank at 60fps on desktop.
On mobile devices, adaptive shader and animation complexity adjusts for optimal performance.
Low-performance devices fallback to static or Lottie animation.

title: Numerology Profile Generation
description: Validate that the Numerology feature generates detailed, accurate profiles based on user inputs and displays them correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to Numerology section.
Input necessary data such as name and birthdate.
Numerology report is generated with all expected profile elements.
Displayed information matches the calculated numerology data.

title: AI Vision Palmistry and Face Reading
description: Verify AI Vision correctly analyzes uploaded palm and face images and returns accurate palmistry and face reading results.

steps.description: Upload a palm image for analysis.
System processes image using AI Vision and returns palmistry insights.
Upload a face image for face reading.
System processes face image and returns face reading results.
Results are displayed clearly and correspond to the uploaded images.

title: AI Guru Chat Functionality and Contextual Responses
description: Validate that the AI Guru chat interface provides contextual, personalized, and scripture-referenced spiritual guidance.

steps.description: Navigate to AI Guru Chat page.
Send a query related to astrology or spirituality.
AI Guru returns a relevant, coherent, and context-aware response.
Response includes appropriate scripture references where applicable.
Send multiple context-dependent queries to verify session context is maintained.
Responses maintain continuity and relevance across session.

title: Payment Flow with Razorpay Integration
description: Verify that payment transactions through Razorpay complete successfully, update subscription states, and handle payment failures properly.

steps.description: Navigate to subscription/payment page.
Select a subscription plan.
Proceed to pay using Razorpay gateway.
Complete payment with valid card details.
Payment is processed successfully.
User subscription state is updated accordingly in their profile.
Attempt payment with invalid card details.
Payment fails with clear error message.
Subscription state remains unchanged in failure case.

title: Responsive UI and Adaptive Animations
description: Verify that the app UI and animations adapt correctly and maintain performance across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

steps.description: Load the app on desktop browser.
UI layouts are correct and animations run smoothly at 60fps.
Load the app on a tablet device.
UI adapts to tablet screen size; shader and animation complexity adjust for performance.
Load the app on a mobile device.
UI adapts correctly for mobile; complex animations degrade gracefully with fallback.

title: Accessibility Compliance Testing
description: Ensure all pages and components meet WCAG 2.2 Level AA standards including keyboard navigability, screen reader support, focus outlines, and reduced motion support.

steps.description: Navigate the app using keyboard only.
All interactive elements are reachable and usable with keyboard.
Use screen reader to access key pages (dashboard, onboarding, AI Guru chat).
Screen reader reads meaningful, descriptive labels and statuses.
Enable reduced motion mode in system or app settings.
App respects reduced motion preference, disabling or simplifying animations.

title: Soundscape and Animation Volume Controls
description: Verify that soundscape, music volume toggles, and animation volume controls function correctly and respect user system preferences and app settings.

steps.description: Navigate to settings or dashboard where sound and animation controls are accessible.
Toggle soundscape and animation volume on/off.
Sound and animation volume respond immediately to toggles.
Set system-level preference for reduced motion or muted sound.
App respects system preference automatically.

title: Notification Center Functionality
description: Verify that users receive, view, and interact with notifications related to horoscope updates, reports, and payment statuses, ensuring accessibility and responsiveness.

steps.description: Trigger notifications for horoscope updates, report availability, and payment status changes.
Notifications appear in the notification center.
Access notification center and interact with notifications.
Notifications can be marked read, dismissed, or used to navigate to relevant content.
Notification center is keyboard navigable and screen-reader accessible.

title: Admin Panel User Management
description: Verify that administrators can view, search, filter, add, edit, and deactivate user accounts with RBAC enforced and proper UI feedback.

steps.description: Log in to the admin panel with an admin account.
Navigate to user management section.
Search for users by email, name, or ID.
Users matching search criteria appear.
Edit a user's profile and save changes.
Changes are saved and reflected immediately.
Deactivate a user account.
User access is revoked and status updated.
Attempt to access admin features with a non-admin user.
Access is denied with appropriate error message.

title: Admin Panel Payment Processing and Monitoring
description: Verify that admin users can monitor, process, and manage payments and subscriptions, including viewing payment logs and statuses securely.

steps.description: Log in as admin.
Navigate to payments management section.
Display list of all payments with filters by date, user, status.
View detailed log of a payment transaction.
Payment details and status shown accurately.
Attempt payment refund or retry actions (if supported).
Actions complete successfully with updated logs.

title: Performance Testing: Stable FPS and Resource Usage
description: Ensure the app maintains stable 60fps on desktop and adapts rendering on low-performance devices, while resource usage stays within defined limits without UI jank.

steps.description: Load the app on a high-performance desktop.
FPS is consistently near 60fps during animations and interactions.
Load the app on low-performance or mobile device.
Rendering adjusts automatically, maintaining smooth UI experience.
Resource usage monitored (CPU/GPU/memory) stays below thresholds.
Navigate through multiple feature pages rapidly.
No significant frame drops, no animation jank or delays.

title: Content Accessibility and Navigation in Admin Panel
description: Verify that all admin panel components for content system and knowledge base are accessible, editable, and searchable with proper RBAC enforced.

steps.description: Admin logs in and accesses content system.
Search, create, edit, and delete knowledge base articles.
Operations complete without errors and changes persist.
Non-admin users attempt to access admin content pages.
Access is denied with appropriate error messages.

title: Validation of Multi-Step Onboarding Error Handling
description: Verify proper validation triggers error messages when required fields are empty or invalid during onboarding steps.

steps.description: Start onboarding flow as new user.
Attempt to proceed with missing birth details.
Validation error message is shown preventing progression.
Enter invalid data formats (e.g., text in date fields).
Relevant error message displayed and focus set on invalid field.
Skip image uploads or upload unsupported formats.
Error is shown and user is instructed to fix the issue.

title: Verification of Subscription State Consistency Post Payment
description: Verify that subscription states remain consistent and accurately reflect the user's current plan after payment processing or cancellation.

steps.description: Complete a payment for a subscription plan.
User subscription status is updated to active with correct plan details.
Cancel the subscription.
Subscription status updates correctly to cancelled or expired.
Make partial or failed payments.
Subscription state remains accurate without granting premium access.
